title: A Pena
body: A single issue of a newspaper that was published in May 1908 in homage to Counselor Dr. José Leite Monteiro.

José Leite Monteiro: Counselor honored with the publication of a single issue of a newspaper in May 1908.

1908: Month in which a single issue of a newspaper was published in honor of Counselor Dr. José Leite Monteiro.
